bibl.title: éArsino˝thw nomÒw. Administration of the Fayum under Roman Rule. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VII.) <Arsinoïtes nomos>
bibl.note: Introduction. - Chapter One. The place of éArsino˝thw nomÒw in the Egyptian Administrative System under Roman Rule. - Chapter Two. The Central Administration of the Nome. The Merides. - Chapter Three. The Arsinoite Toparchies. - Chapter Four. Komogrammateiai. Village Officials (Komogrammateis, Presbyteroi acting as Komogrammateis, Amphodogrammateis, Komarchai). - Chapter Five. The Arsinoite Pagi. Unification of the Administrative Structures. - Conclusion. - Bibliography. Indices. <Arsinoïtes nomos>
DERDA Tomasz, éArsino˝thw nomÒw. Administration of the Fayum under Roman Rule. (The Journal of Juristic Papyrology. Supplements. Volume VII.) <Arsinoïtes nomos>
Warsaw, The Journal of Juristic Papyrology, 2006, 8°, xviii-345 pp., front. coul., 2 tabl., 4 cartes. ISBN 83-918250-6-X.
